content: sometimes we need a warm and cozy gift for ourselves or someone we care about a knitted cap is a fast and easy gift it s also a great way to try out a new yarn or use up an odd ball from our stash this cap is knitted in the round with two brim options i knitted both samples in malabrigo rios but pick any luscious soft worsted weight yarn you fancy the baby cable brim option had an errata the website pattern is now correct i m sorry for any inconvenience happy knitting
